text: Nag be okok jakɨl, mɨdup pulɨnɨg sum gup okok nɨŋɨd, gos nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb agak. Chech tap okok wog kɨles gɨnɨgel tek ma lup ak pen, nag sum teplep yɨbɨl okok mɨdeb agak. Yad nɨbop agebin, bɨnonɨm Solomon tap kuŋay mɨdɨl chech teplep yɨbɨl yek ak pen, nag mɨdup mokayaŋ gɨñub anɨb ak tek, Solomon ne ma yek agak.
